title: Isaiah 35:1
text: THE wilderness and the solitary place shall be glad for them; and the desert shall rejoice, and blossom as the rose.

title: Isaiah 35:2
text: It shall blossom abundantly, and rejoice even with joy and singing: the glory of Lebanon shall be given unto it, the excellency of Carmel and Sharon, they shall see the glory of the LORD, and the excellency of our God.

title: Isaiah 35:3
text: Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees.

title: Isaiah 35:4
text: Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.

title: Isaiah 35:5
text: Then the eyes of the blind shall be opened, and the ears of the deaf shall be unstopped.

title: Isaiah 35:6
text: Then shall the lame man leap as an hart, and the tongue of the dumb sing: for in the wilderness shall waters break out, and streams in the desert.

title: Isaiah 35:7
text: And the parched ground shall become a pool, and the thirsty land springs of water: in the habitation of dragons, where each lay, shall be grass with reeds and rushes.

title: Isaiah 35:8
text: And an highway shall be there, and a way, and it shall be called The way of holiness; the unclean shall not pass over it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men, though fools, shall not err therein.

title: Isaiah 35:9
text: No lion shall be there, nor any ravenous beast shall go up thereon, it shall not be found there; but the redeemed shall walk there:

title: Isaiah 35:10
text: And the ransomed of the LORD shall return, and come to Zion with songs and everlasting joy upon their heads: they shall obtain joy and gladness, and sorrow and sighing shall flee away.
